dt: {bc}someone who seeks dangerous or exciting experiences {bc}a person who looks for {a_link|adventures}: such as
{bc}one who engages in risky commercial enterprises for profit
{bc}one who seeks unmerited wealth or position especially by playing on the credulity or prejudice of others

et: {et_link|adventure:1|adventure:1} or {et_link|adventure:2|adventure:2} + {et_link|-er:2|-er:2}, probably after Middle French {it}aventurier, adventurier{/it}
shortdef: someone who seeks dangerous or exciting experiences : a person who looks for adventures: such as
one who engages in risky commercial enterprises for profit
